"Zeshraider Arm Blade Supply":
"Recently I've been getting into the presentation of the dishes I make,
but I don't have a really good quality knife...
Presentation is important for a dish right?
I want a knife that is made from the highest quality materials
and is a step above other masterwork knives!
I wonder what the most appropriate material is?

*Zeshraider of Lv. 47 or higher"
"ゼッシュレイダの腕刃片の調達"

"最近料理の飾りつけに凝っているんだけど
私、細工包丁って持ってないのよね……
やっぱり料理って、見た目も大切でしょ？
ここはひとつ最高の素材で作った
ひと味違う細工包丁を手に入れたいの！
ふさわしい素材、何かないかしら？

※Lv.47～のゼッシュレイダが対象"
